01.description: Problem in Remote Room Air sensor
01.reason: Remote air temperature sensor of MainPCB(indoor) is open or short.

02.reason: Refrigerant inlet pipe temperature sensor of indoor unit is open or short.

03.description: Communication error between indoor unit and wired remote controller
03.reason: Communication between wired remote controller and indoor unit is not possible.

05.description: Communication error between Main PCB(Indoor) and Main PCB(Outdoor Cycle)
05.reason: There is no communication between the Main PCB(Indoor) and the Main PCB(Outdoor cycle).

06.description: Problem in Refrigerant pipe sensor (Outlet side)
06.reason: Refrigerant outlet pipe temperature sensor of indoor unit is open or short.

08.reason: Domestic hot water tank temperature sensor of indoor unit is open or short.

09.reason: The optional EEPROM is loosely inserted in or disconnected from the Main PCB(Indoor)

13.reason: Solar pipe temperature sensor of indoor unit is open or short.

14.reason: Low flow detection during pump operation

15.reason: The temperature of the water pipe has exceeded a certain temperature.

16.reason: An error code 17,18,19 error has occurred at the same time.

17.reason: Water inlet pipe temperature sensor of indoor unit is open or short.

18.reason: Water outlet pipe temperature sensor of indoor unit is open or short.

19.reason: Electric backup heater outlet temperature sensor of indoor unit is open or short.

20.reason: Fuse of electric heater is blown due to overheat.

21.reason: DC Peak(IPM Fault) Comp is stopped to prevent the power module from being damaged by detecting the Fault Out signal of the power element.

22.reason: Overcurrent flows to the outdoor unit that measures the outdoor unit current.

23.reason: This is when the Comp is running when the DC Link is low or high.

24.reason: This is the case when the discharge pressure of the outdoor unit compressor is excessively increased.

26.reason: No Position Error occurs when the initial startup of Comp does not work normally.

27.reason: This is the case of overcurrent or CT overcurrent inside PFC.Over current is passed through PFC module.

29.reason: Input current for Inverter Compressor exceeds the limit.

32.reason: Temperature of discharge pipe is abnormally high.

40.reason: Comp control is not possible due to CT sensor error in Inv Driver

41.reason: Discharge pipe temperature sensor of outdoor unit is open or short.

43.reason: Comp cannot be controlled due to high pressure sensor error

44.reason: Outdoor air temperature sensor is open or short.

45.reason: Cond. Middle pipe temperature sensor is open or short.

46.reason: Suction pipe temperature sensor is open or short.

48.reason: Condenser Out Pipe thermistor isn't inserted or is inserted incorrectly

52.description: Inv PCB(Outdoor) -Main PCB(Outdoor Cycle) Communication Error
52.reason: Communication between Inv PCB(Outdoor) -Main PCB(Outdoor Cycle) is not available

53.description: Main PCB(Indoor) - Main PCB(Outdoor) Communication Error
53.reason: It is failed to receive the signal from IDU.

54.reason: Wiring fault is occurred. – reverse phase (only 3-phase model)

57.description: Main PCB(Indoor) → Inv PCB(Outdoor) Communication Error
57.reason: Main PCB (Outdoor Cycle) → Inv PCB (Outdoor) communication is defective

60.reason: EEPROM is loose or missing, or it is burnt out.

62.reason: Temperature of heatsink or element is abnormally high.

65.reason: This occurs when the temperature cannot be sensed above the heat sink sensor or the PSCM or PFCM internal sensor.

114.reason: Vapor injection inlet pipe temperature sensor of outdoor unit is open or short.

115.reason: Vapor injection outlet pipe temperature sensor of outdoor unit is open or short.

231.reason: Water Pressure Sensor of indoor unit is damaged.

232.reason: Flow Sensor of indoor unit is damaged.
